cn.title: 关于防范 "虚假比特派 Telegram 群" 的声明

message.data: 近期，经用户反馈，我们发现 Telegram 上竟然有 8000 人的假的“比特派官方群”，群内管理员一直在用各种方法试图欺骗用户的助记词。
请大家对虚假信息予以警惕，不要在任何网站输入助记词，也不要把助记词透露给任何人，谨防资产损失。
如有问题请联系官方工作人员：support@bitpie.com

en.title: Statement on preventing "FALSE Bitpie Telegram Group"

message.data: Recently, users reported that there is a false "Bitpie Official Group" with 8,000 members on Telegram. The administrators of the group have been using various methods to try deceiving users' mnemonics.
Please be alert to scam, do not enter mnemonic words on any website, and do not disclose the mnemonic words to anyone, and beware the loss of asset.
If you have any questions, please contact official staffs: support@bitpie.com
